category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAlignmentCheckReportLocation
preference.preference_description: Defines if a persisted EBOM-MBOM alignment report is stored in a dataset in the My Teamcenter Newstuff folder or if it is attached to the item revision of the top line of the target window. Valid Values: 0 - The alignment check report is stored in the Newstuff folder. 1 - The alignment check report is stored on the item revision of the top line of the target window.
